title: Copy Data URI as Image
body:
This feature would add a "Copy image" context menu to any CSS value that contained a base64 encoded image (in a data URI). The command would be used to decode and copy the image to the clipboard where it could be posted into another application.

Proposed Design
- New context menu item "Copy &image" to be enabled for any CSS properties in any of the styles views that contain a data URI
- A RegEx (TBD) will be used to detect a data URI (and the bounds of it)
- The command will decode the image (based on the media type supplied in the URI) to a bitmap that can be copied to the clipboard
